question: Mengapa CATAPA mengubah kebijakan format email di User Management dari hanya huruf kecil menjadi mendukung huruf besar (uppercase), dan bagaimana dampak teknisnya terhadap integrasi sistem?
expected_response: Perubahan ini dipicu oleh masalah integrasi dengan Darwinbox, di mana sinkronisasi data ke CATAPA mengalami galat (error) validasi karena sistem lama CATAPA mewajibkan format all lowercase, sementara Darwinbox memiliki data email dengan karakter huruf besar. Pengguna sebelumnya menerima pesan kesalahan "email does not match valid email format". Berdasarkan riset, email bersifat case insensitive, sehingga huruf besar tidak mempengaruhi pengiriman pesan. Solusi yang diambil adalah mengizinkan input manual email dengan huruf besar di aplikasi serta mendukung penyimpanan email uppercase melalui sinkronisasi data Darwinbox agar pengguna tidak perlu mengubah data di sistem asal.
expected_chunk_automated:
Email Uppercase Lowercase User Management

Notes
Silakan hapus halaman ini jika dalam pembuatan Requirement

1)	Diperbolehkan untuk menambahkan section lain di luar yang sudah tertuang pada dokumen ini, jika memang dirasa perlu.

2)	Tidak menutup kemungkinan jika suatu saat section tambahan seperti yang disebutkan pada poin 1 menjadi default section yang ada pada template PRD.

Background
Ketika melakukan integrasi dengan Darwinbox, saat melakukan sync ke CATAPA, terdapat error validasi email di CATAPA, dimana pada aturan sistem CATAPA tidak diperbolehkan format email terdapat karakter uppercase. Sedangkan, data darwinbox terdapat email dengan format karakter uppercase.

Request customer agar dapat memasukkan email dengan uppercase pada halaman konfigurasi user list di user management dan saat sync data dari Darwinbox. Saat ini policy di CATAPA hanya mengizinkan menginputkan email dengan format all lowercase. Pada halaman konfigurasi user management user list di CATAPA, apabila email diketik menggunakan uppercase, akan muncul "email does not match valid email format".

Customer Requests

###

Email Uppercase Lowercase User Management
Background

Customer Requests

|    | 0   | 1                           | 2                                             | 3                  |
|---:|:----|:----------------------------|:----------------------------------------------|:-------------------|
|  0 | #   | Request Title               | Requested by                                  | Action/Description |
|  1 | 1.  | Uppercase & Lowercase Email | Putra Mulia Telecommunication (2155 employee) | 1)	Current condition                    |
|    |     |                             |                                               | 	a)	Email hanya bisa lowercase                    |
|    |     |                             |                                               | 2)	Problem statement                    |
|    |     |                             |                                               | 	a)	Ketika ada email dengan kombinasi uppercase & lowercase di Darwinbox, ketika sync ke CATAPA akan error validasi email di CATAPA, dimana email harus lowercase semua.                    |
|    |     |                             |                                               | 3)	Expectation user                    |
|    |     |                             |                                               | 	a)	Tidak ada validasi uppercase & lowercase untuk email agar tidak ada error sync dan dari user tidak perlu mengubah email di Darwinbox.                    |

###

Mengedit informasi pengguna dengan mudah.
Kolom wajib untuk mengisi username dan nama karyawan.
Format email yang tidak valid menunjukkan kesalahan.
Verifikasi dua langkah saat ini dinonaktifkan.
Pastikan semua kolom diisi dengan benar sebelum menyimpan.

[image_cf4ca355767a33ce](Caption: Mengedit informasi pengguna dengan mudah.)

###

Email Uppercase Lowercase User Management

Solution
Email memiliki sifat case insensitive [Source: [mailchimp.com]](https://mailchimp.com/resources/are-email-addresses-case-sensitive/#:~:text=The%20short%20answer%20is%20no,received%20by%20an%20email%20server.)

“If you accidentally capitalize or don’t capitalize a letter in an email address, will that affect the ability of the email to reach its destination? The short answer is no; email address syntax is not case sensitive.

Capitalization generally has no impact on whether or not an email is sent or received by an email server. It will get delivered regardless of whether or not letters are capitalized.”

Sudah dikonfirmasi oleh Kak Agus Bimantoro, terkait perubahan ini tidak masalah.

[AAAA@gmail.com](mailto:AAAA@gmail.com)

[aaaa@gmail.com](mailto:aaaa@gmail.com)

Sehingga, solusi yang diajukan untuk masalah ini adalah sebagai berikut:

1)	[Edit manual in apps] Mengizinkan user untuk menginputkan email dengan uppercase.

2)	[Darwinbox data sync] Mengizinkan data sync untuk menyimpan email dengan uppercase.

Architecture
{Part of collaboration bersama dengan Engineer, jika dibutuhkan arsitektur baru dari pembuatan atau pengembangan fitur. Contohnya, flowchart dari sudut pandang engineer. Diperbolehkan untuk mencantumkan hyperlink saja jika dibutuhkan}

API Contract
{ Part of collaboration bersama dengan Engineer. Section ini digunakan jika dibutuhkan untuk sync antara frontend dan backend engineer }

Metrics
Number of users used Email field to assign employee’s email and user list email.

Tracking Implementation

###

Email Uppercase Lowercase User Management
Tracking Implementation

{ Part of collaboration bersama dengan Engineer. Section ini digunakan jika dibutuhkan untuk sync antara frontend dan backend engineer }
Metrics
Number of users used Email field to assign employee’s email and user list email.
Tracking Implementation

|    | 0   | 1                                         | 2    | 3                 | 4      | 5       | 6       | 7       |
|---:|:----|:------------------------------------------|:-----|:------------------|:-------|:--------|:--------|:--------|
|  0 | ID  | Test Cases                                | Case | Expected Result   | Result | Dev     | Demo    | Prod    |
|  1 | 1   | Allow user to input email using uppercase | 1)	User input email using upper case      | Successfully save |        | Passed  | Not yet | Not yet |
|    |     |                                           | 2)	Click button “Save”      |                   |        |         |         |         |
|  2 | 2   |                                           |      |                   |        | Not yet | Not yet | Not yet |

question: Jelaskan rincian permasalahan pada format Excel Editable versi lama serta solusi yang dipilih berdasarkan survey tenant untuk meningkatkan efisiensi operasional HR
expected_response: Permasalahan utama format lama adalah redundansi data di mana satu karyawan muncul di banyak baris jika memiliki lebih dari satu komponen gaji editable, sehingga menyulitkan HR dalam pengisian. Berdasarkan survey, 81,8% tenant menyetujui Solusi No. 5, yaitu mengubah format menjadi satu baris per karyawan dengan banyak kolom untuk komponen gaji. Meskipun solusi ini akan menghasilkan sel kosong ("-") jika karyawan tidak memiliki komponen tertentu, hal ini dianggap lebih efisien daripada navigasi antar tab. Sistem juga menyertakan validasi baru: batas maksimal 500 komponen gaji untuk pengunduhan, kewajiban mengisi Employee ID agar proses tidak berhenti, serta pesan kesalahan spesifik jika tipe jumlah yang diinput bukan angka atau jika komponen gaji tidak terdaftar dalam Salary Template karyawan.
expected_chunk_automated:
Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History

Background
Berbagai tenant di CATAPA menggunakan komponen gaji Editable pada proses penggajiannya. Saat ini, CATAPA memiliki 2 cara untuk meng-input komponen gaji Editable ke dalam sistem, (1) Excel (2) Halaman Editable Editor. Dalam implementasi kesehariannya, tenant yang menggunakan Excel untuk meng-input atau update komponen gaji Editable akan dihadapkan data karyawan yang berulang karena komponen gaji Editable karyawan tersebut lebih dari satu.

Problem Statement
1)	Data karyawan yang redundan karena 1 karyawan yang sama dapat memiliki lebih dari satu baris dikarenakan data Editable yang dimiliki karyawan tersebut lebih dari satu.

2)	Kesulitan bagi HR untuk melakukan pengisian data editable karena satu karyawan bisa memiliki lebih dari 1 baris.

Objective
Mengubah format editable supaya lebih efisien dalam pengisiannya tanpa data karyawan yang berulang.

Current Implementation
[image_0d14267d438b56a9]

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History
Current Implementation

1)	Beberapa data karyawan yang berulang (Employee ID & Name) dan muncul lebih dari 1 baris karena karyawan memiliki lebih dari 1 komponen gaji editable

	a)	Alpha: 2 baris (tax correction + dan -)

	b)	Charlie: 2 baris (overtime + dan -)

	c)	Delta: 4 baris (tax correction + dan -, overtime + dan -)

2)	Jika karyawan tidak memiliki komponen gaji Editable tertentu, maka komponen gaji Editable tersebut tidak akan muncul untuk karyawan tersebut

3)	Jika ada tambahan salary item editable pada salary template, user dapat update nilai editable tanpa harus update SK gaji, editable tetap akan terhitung

Behavior Editable with Multiple Salary Changes
1)	Jika ada perubahan salary template yang menyebabkan editable berubah

	a)	Awal

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History
Solution

2)	Mungkin menimbulkan request tenant untuk dibuatkan format-format baru untuk file migration lainnya

Pros:

1)	Menjadi nilai jual CATAPA dan dapat digunakan untuk seluruh tenant

2)	Tenant dapat memilih format yang mereka inginkan

4. Transpose row & column di excel

Flow:

1)	Arahkan user dengan memberikan tips cara transpose row dan column di Excel

2)	User dapat melakukan transpose column to row pada file Excelnya, lalu copy file tersebut ke file migrasi Editable CATAPA. Referensi:[ https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/transpose-function-ed039415-ed8a-4a81-93e9-4b6dfac76027](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/transpose-function-ed039415-ed8a-4a81-93e9-4b6dfac76027)

Cons:

1)	Manual proses dari sisi tenant

2)	Tidak mempermudah proses pengisian editable

Pros:

1)	Tidak ada pengembangan apapun dari tenant

5. Traditional development mengubah format migration

Format template: Satu tab excel untuk seluruh karyawan

Flow:

1)	User download template file migrasi Editable

2)	Format data: employee 1 row, editable multiple column

[image_792f9212016edfeb]

###

Tabel ini menunjukkan koreksi pajak dan lembur karyawan.
Karyawan Alpha menerima koreksi pajak positif sebesar 100,000.
Karyawan Beta mendapatkan koreksi lembur negatif sebesar 50,000.
Karyawan Delta mendapat koreksi pajak sebesar 80,000 dan koreksi lembur negatif 10,000.
Karyawan Charlie mengalami koreksi lembur positif tertinggi sebesar 200,000.

[image_792f9212016edfeb](Caption: Tabel ini menunjukkan koreksi pajak dan lembur karyawan.)

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History
Decision

Decision
Melihat beberapa solusi yang dapat dilakukan, pendekatan yang ingin dicapai adalah memberikan value ke seluruh tenant dalam pengisian editable supaya mempermudah proses operasional bulanan HR. Oleh karena itu, dilakukan survey yang menggunakan Solusi No. 5.
Berikut adalah tenant yang menjawab survey atau interview:

|  2 | Kurio                            | 60            |

|  5 | PT. BPR LEXI PRATAMA MANDIRI     | 74            |

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History
Detail Solution
Error Lists

Error Lists

|    |   # | Error Lists                                            | EN                                                                                                                                                        | ID                                                                                                                                                          |
|---:|----:|:-------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|  0 |   1 | Input value in which employee does not have editable   | Unable to edit “{Editable Code}” because salary item does not exist in the Salary Template, please recheck your data or Salary Template of your employee. | Tidak dapat mengubah “{Editable Code}” karena komponen gaji tidak ada di Template Gaji, mohon cek kembali data Anda atau Template Gaji karyawan Anda.       |
|  1 |   2 | Try to edit editable when salary payment has been done | Unable to edit editable because salary payment has been processed, please undo salary payment before re-edit.                                             | Tidak dapat mengubah editable karena pembayaran gaji sudah dilakukan, mohon batalkan pembayaran gaji sebelum mengubah ulang.                                |
|  2 |   3 | Input wrong format for example string / special chars  | Editable amount type is incorrect, please fill in with number.                                                                                            | Tipe jumlah editable salah, mohon isi dengan angka.                                                                                                         |
|  3 |   4 | Not the latest regular salary process                  | Unable to edit editable because not on the latest salary calculation, please undo the latest salary calculation(s) first.                                 | Tidak dapat mengubah editable karena bukan pada perhitungan gaji paling baru, mohon batalkan perhitungan gaji terakhir terlebih dahulu.                     |
|  4 |   5 | [NEW] File download exceed salary item limit           | Unable to download file because it exceeds the maximum limit of 500 salary items, please use the download option by specific salary item(s).              | Tidak dapat mendownload file karena melebihi batas maksimal 500 komponen gaji, mohon gunakan opsi download berdasarkan komponen gaji tertentu.              |
|  5 |   6 | [NEW] User does not input editable amount              | Editable amount must be filled, please fill it with number.                                                                                               | Jumlah editable harus diisi, mohon diisi dengan angka.                                                                                                      |
|  6 |   7 | Wrong paygroup                                         | Unable to update editable because selected paygroup does not match with employee paygroup, please recheck the selected paygroup.                          | Tidak dapat memperbarui editable karena kelompok gaji yang dipilih tidak cocok dengan kelompok gaji karyawan, mohon cek kembali kelompok gaji yang dipilih. |
|  7 |   8 | Employee ID deleted                                    | Employee ID must be filled, please fill in according to employee ID field on Employee Data.                                                               | Nomor Induk Karyawan harus diisi, mohon diisi sesuai Nomor Induk Karyawan di Data Karyawan.                                                                 |

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History

ACKed Behavior
1)	If user upload data into the wrong paygroup, then there will be an error message about wrong paygroup and all salary item’s cells will be blue-colored

2)	User MUST fill out the Employee ID to successfully add the data. This is due to the limitation of all Excel migration in CATAPA; if at the beginning of the row is EMPTY, then the system will stop executing.

3)	What is being shown at file Excel failed and Detail Statistic View failed is all the data that the users has filled out and uploaded before. For example, if they filled out an amount with `ABC` (text not numbers) then at the excel and detail statistic will show `ABC`.

4)	If users add a new editable `A02 - Editable Baru” in a new column, and there are 3 employees Uno, Dos, Tres, where Uno and Dos have this editable but Tres does not. When there’s a failed excel due to a user trying to input Tres’ editable, the cell color A02 - Editable Baru will not be grayed out but it will be blue, but the error message will still work (Refer to error list #1)

5)	If users change/update cell color on template

	a)	If what users input on the cell is correct but they change the cell color

		i)	Will be uploaded successfully, color does not impact the upload mechanism

	b)	If what users input on the cell leads to an error (i.e. String – refer to error list to check out what can leads to an error) and they change the cell color

		i)	Then after uploading, the cell color will stay the same as what users have updated before 
→ i.e. users update it from blue to gray, then the cell color will be gray although it should not be grayed out. But, the error message will be correct – `Editable amount type is incorrect, please fill in with number.`)

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History
Appendix

Discussion on 2 Feb 2023
Attendees: [Stefanus Christofan](mailto:stefanus.christofan@gdplabs.id) [Felix Adhinata](mailto:felix.adhinata@gdplabs.id) [Annisaur Rosi Lutfiana](mailto:annisaur.r.lutfiana@gdplabs.id) [Nabilla Hariyana](mailto:nabilla.hariyana@gdplabs.id) [Yusuf Surya Tryantono](mailto:yusuf.s.tryantono@gdplabs.id)

1)	User bisa mengira field Periode pada informasi bagian penjelasan bisa diisi dan menganggap data editable akan diupload ke Periode tersebut. Selain itu data periode sudah muncul pada excel name.

Answer: Periode di take out dari bagian penjelasan Excel.

2)	Kalau ternyata Excel bisa lock setiap cell, apakah akan pakai cara yang sekarang tidak lock sama sekali atau tetap diimplement locknya?

Answer: Bisa tetap implement lock cell.

3)	Apakah bisa dicoba jika employee tidak punya editable, lalu diinput 0 oleh user maka input 0 bisa diignore?

Answer: Akan dicoba oleh BE

4)	Jika ada error dimana employee otak atik header dan salary item di header tidak ditemukan, maka akan muncul error setiap baris employee, apakah tidak apa-apa?

Answer: Ya tidak apa-apa, tiap employee akan ada error setiap baris.

Maximum Excel Column

Enhance Editable Excel Format

--	Data editable yang ada SK gaji sebelumnya tidak muncul

2)        User dapat melakukan transpose column to row pada file Excelnya, lalu copy file tersebut ke file migrasi Editable CATAPA. Cons:

1)        Manual proses dari sisi tenant

2)        Tidak mempermudah proses pengisian editable

Pros:

1)        Tidak ada pengembangan apapun dari tenant

5. Traditional development mengubah format migration

Format template: Satu tab excel untuk seluruh karyawan

Flow:

1)        User download template file migrasi Editable

2)        Format data: employee 1 row, editable multiple column

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History

ACKed Behavior
1)        If user upload data into the wrong paygroup, then there will be an error message about wrong paygroup and all salary item’s cells will be blue-colored

2)        User MUST fill out the Employee ID to successfully add the data. This is due to the limitation of all Excel migration in CATAPA; if at the beginning of the row is EMPTY, then the system will stop executing.

3)        What is being shown at file Excel failed and Detail Statistic View failed is all the data that the users has filled out and uploaded before. For example, if they filled out an amount with `ABC` (text not numbers) then at the excel and detail statistic will show `ABC`.

4)        If users add a new editable `A02 - Editable Baru” in a new column, and there are 3 employees Uno, Dos, Tres, where Uno and Dos have this editable but Tres does not. When there’s a failed excel due to a user trying to input Tres’ editable, the cell color A02 - Editable Baru will not be grayed out but it will be blue, but the error message will still work (Refer to error list #1)

5)        If users change/update cell color on template

        a)        If what users input on the cell is correct but they change the cell color

                i)        Will be uploaded successfully, color does not impact the upload mechanism

        b)        If what users input on the cell leads to an error (i.e. String – refer to error list to check out what can leads to an error) and they change the cell color

                i)        Then after uploading, the cell color will stay the same as what users have updated before 
→ i.e. users update it from blue to gray, then the cell color will be gray although it should not be grayed out. But, the error message will be correct – `Editable amount type is incorrect, please fill in with number.`)

###

Enhance Editable Excel Format
Revision History
Appendix

Discussion on 2 Feb 2023
Attendees: [Stefanus Christofan](mailto:stefanus.christofan@gdplabs.id) [Felix Adhinata](mailto:felix.adhinata@gdplabs.id) [Annisaur Rosi Lutfiana](mailto:annisaur.r.lutfiana@gdplabs.id) [Nabilla Hariyana](mailto:nabilla.hariyana@gdplabs.id) [Yusuf Surya Tryantono](mailto:yusuf.s.tryantono@gdplabs.id)

1)        User bisa mengira field Periode pada informasi bagian penjelasan bisa diisi dan menganggap data editable akan diupload ke Periode tersebut. Selain itu data periode sudah muncul pada excel name.

Answer: Periode di take out dari bagian penjelasan Excel.

2)        Kalau ternyata Excel bisa lock setiap cell, apakah akan pakai cara yang sekarang tidak lock sama sekali atau tetap diimplement locknya?

Answer: Bisa tetap implement lock cell.

3)        Apakah bisa dicoba jika employee tidak punya editable, lalu diinput 0 oleh user maka input 0 bisa diignore?

Answer: Akan dicoba oleh BE

4)        Jika ada error dimana employee otak atik header dan salary item di header tidak ditemukan, maka akan muncul error setiap baris employee, apakah tidak apa-apa?

Answer: Ya tidak apa-apa, tiap employee akan ada error setiap baris.

question: Bagaimana peningkatan fitur Repository merespons regulasi CORETAX dan apa strategi sistem untuk mencegah risiko penyalahgunaan kapasitas penyimpanan oleh tenant?
expected_response: Akibat transisi CORETAX, sertifikat pajak 1721 A1 yang dihasilkan CATAPA secara langsung tidak lagi valid secara hukum; hanya sertifikat dari sistem CORETAX dengan nomor resmi dan tanda tangan digital yang diakui. Oleh karena itu, fitur Repository ditingkatkan agar HR dapat mengunggah sertifikat valid tersebut secara masal untuk diunduh mandiri oleh karyawan melalui ESS. Untuk memitigasi risiko penyalahgunaan penyimpanan (storage abuse) yang diprediksi bisa mencapai 12,5 TB per tenant jika tidak dibatasi, CATAPA mengusulkan solusi Tenant-Level Storage Limits. Kapasitas penyimpanan dasar dihitung secara otomatis berdasarkan jumlah karyawan (Max Employees × 500 MB), dengan opsi pembelian Add-On jika diperlukan. Sistem akan memblokir unggahan baru jika batas total kapasitas telah tercapai.

Repository Enhancement

Background
Current Business Context
CATAPA HRIS currently provides a Repository feature for managing employee files within the system. The feature supports basic operations: upload, delete, and retrieve employee documents with a capacity of 50 files per employee.

1)	[BCAI] Business Driver: CORETAX Transition Impact
The Indonesian Tax Authority (DJP) has transitioned to the CORETAX system for tax document generation, creating a significant change in how organizations handle tax withholding certificates:

--	Previous State: CATAPA could generate 1721 A1 PDF certificates directly

--	Current State: Only certificates generated from CORETAX with official document numbers and digital signatures are considered valid

--	Impact: CATAPA-generated certificates are no longer legally valid

2)	Client Request: BCAI Requirements
PT. BCA Insurance (BCAI) has 724 employees and requires:

--	Employees must be able to self-download their 1721 A1 certificates through CATAPA ESS

--	BCAI will download official certificates from CORETAX and upload them to CATAPA

--	Certificates must be accessible to employees independently without HR intervention

###

Repository Enhancement
Background

3)	Djarum - Profile Photo Management
Djarum requires capability to manage employee profile photos at scale:

--	Bulk update employee profile photos (idea: can be supported via repository massive upload feature)

--	Source: Photos exported from zip in JPG format

--	File Naming Convention: [EmployeeID]-[EmployeeName].jpg (e.g., 02007182-Feri.jpg)

--	Use Case: BPJS pension confirmation process

	--	When employees approach retirement, BPJS team requests photo verification

	--	HR needs to provide current employee photos to BPJS for pension processing

	--	Photos must be recent and properly documented for compliance

--	Volume: Potential bulk updates for hundreds of employees simultaneously

4)	CATAPA Strategic Vision: Employee Documents Integration
CATAPA has a strategic vision to integrate the Employee Documents feature with the Repository feature:

--	Employee Documents: Generate documents (contracts, letters, certificates)

--	Repository: Store and manage generated documents centrally

--	Integration: Seamless document generation → storage → employee access workflow

CASE:

1)

This integration will create a unified document lifecycle management system within CATAPA.

Other Customer Requests

Below is the mapping of tenants with similar customer requests:

###

Repository Enhancement

Problem Statement
Problem 1: Inefficient Manual Upload Process
Current Pain Point:

--	Repository only supports one-file-at-a-time upload

--	BCAI needs to upload 1721 A1 certificates for 724 employees annually

--	Manual process is time-consuming (estimated 6-12 hours for 724 files)

--	High risk of human error (wrong file to wrong employee)

--	Not scalable for clients with >1,000 employees

Impact:

--	Poor user experience for HR administrators

--	Delays in employee access to critical documents (tax certificates)

--	Increased support burden on CATAPA team

--	Reduced competitiveness vs. modern HRIS solutions

Problem 2: No ESS Visibility Control
Current Pain Point:

--	No mechanism to control which repository files/groups are visible in ESS

--	All uploaded files are treated equally regardless of sensitivity

--	Cannot differentiate between:

	--	Employee-accessible documents (tax certs, payslips)

	--	Internal HR documents (disciplinary records, notes)

	--	Company-wide policies (handbooks, SOPs)

Impact:

--	Risk of exposing confidential/internal documents to employees

--	Cannot fulfill BCAI's requirement (employees see tax docs, but not internal files)

--	Limits repository usefulness (HR hesitant to upload sensitive docs)

--	Compliance risk (GDPR, Indonesian data protection)

###

Repository Enhancement

Problem 3: No Employee Self-Service Download
Current Pain Point:

--	Employees cannot download repository files from ESS

--	Must request documents from HR/Admin

--	HR must manually send files via email or print

--	No self-service capability

Impact:

--	Defeats the purpose of digitalization

--	High volume of repetitive HR support tickets

--	Poor employee experience (waiting time for documents)

--	Cannot meet BCAI's core requirement

--	HR workload increases unnecessarily

Problem 4: Lack of Document Organization
Current Pain Point:

--	No repository grouping/categorization system

--	All files stored flat without logical structure

--	Difficult to manage different document types (tax forms vs. contracts vs. policies)

--	No standard taxonomy for document organization

Impact:

--	Difficult to search and retrieve specific document types

--	Cannot apply bulk operations by category

--	Cannot set visibility rules by document type

--	Poor scalability (unmanageable with thousands of documents)

Problem 5: Missing Document Generation Integration
Current Pain Point:

--	Employee Documents feature (generates docs) is separate from Repository (stores docs)

--	No automated workflow: generate → store → notify employee

--	Manual steps required to move generated documents to storage

--	No centralized document lifecycle management

Impact:

--	Fragmented user experience (admins use multiple modules)

--	Risk of generated documents not being stored properly

--	No audit trail from generation to employee access

--	Cannot track document lifecycle (created → stored → viewed → downloaded)

Objective and Goals

###

Repository Enhancement

Objective and Goals
Primary Objectives (Must-Have by EOY 2025)
Objective 1: Enable Bulk Document Upload

Goal: Allow HR administrators to upload bulk files simultaneously for multiple employees

Objective 2: Implement ESS Visibility Control

Goal: Provide configuration to control which repository groups/files appear in ESS

Objective 3: Enable Employee Self-Service Download

Goal: Allow employees to view and download their repository files through ESS

Objective 4: Establish Repository Grouping System

Goal: Create logical document categories for organization and bulk operations

Secondary Objectives (Optional/Future Phase)
Objective 5: Integrate Employee Documents with Repository

Goal: Seamless workflow from document generation → automatic storage → employee access

Objective 6: Trustee/Delegation Access

Goal: Allow designated users to access repository files on behalf of others

Assumptions
1)	Proposal Vision for Maximum storage per tenant:

	a)	Currently, CATAPA doesn’t have a total storage limit per tenant.

		i)	[CASE tenant abusing storage] Calculation worst case:

Calculation (Worst Case):

= 10,000 employees × 50 files × 25 MB per file

= 10,000 × 50 × 25

= 12,500,000 MB

= 12,500 GB

= 12.5 TB per tenant

		ii)	Why did this case suddenly become a concern?

			1)	Currently, users have to upload documents one by one, so the chances of this case occurring are still relatively low. However, with the introduction of the massive upload repository feature, the likelihood of users abusing storage may increase because the uploading process becomes much easier through massive upload.

--	Current CATAPA production storage usage:

[image_b71e56daedcebddd]

Assumptions

iv)	Key insight:

			1)	Cost Impact: A single tenant with 10,000 employees using maximum storage limits would increase monthly costs by nearly 1,400% or $1,738.79 USD (Rp 27.8 million).

			2)	Risk Factor: This represents approximately 93% of the total cost in the abuse scenario, despite being only 21% of total users.

			3)	Annual Impact: The abuse would cost an additional $20,865 USD (Rp 333.8 million) per year.

	b)	Current solution: limit storage by limiting the number of employees.

		i)	CATAPA currently enforces employee count limits via console configuration:

			1)	Console Setting: Each tenant has a configurable "Max Employees" limit

			2)	Enforcement: Tenant cannot create more employees than the limit

			3)	Example: A Tenant with limit of 1,000 cannot create the 1,001st employee

		ii)	But this solution did not really solve the potential storage abuse.

	c)	Why the Current Approach Has Potential for Abuse

		i)	No Total Storage Cap

			1)	✅ Employee count: Limited (e.g., 1,000 employees max)

			2)	✅ Files per employee: Limited (50 files max)

			3)	✅ File size: Limited (25 MB max per file)

			4)	❌ Total storage: NOT LIMITED

			5)	Result: 1,000 employees × 50 files × 25 MB = 1,250 GB (1.25 TB) possible

		ii)	Risk 2: Resource Monopolization - Heavy-usage tenants disproportionately consume infrastructure resources, creating inequality across the platform.

		iii)	Risk 3: No Upgrade Path - Legitimate tenants can't purchase additional storage

Tenant legitimately needs more storage:

- Current usage: 600 GB

- Employee count: 1,000 (can't increase without adding employees)

- No mechanism to purchase additional storage ❌

- Tenant is stuck

	d)	Proposal solution: Tenant-Level Storage Limits with Add-On Purchase

###

Repository Enhancement
Assumptions

Tenant legitimately needs more storage:

- Current usage: 600 GB

- Employee count: 1,000 (can't increase without adding employees)

- No mechanism to purchase additional storage ❌

- Tenant is stuck

	d)	Proposal solution: Tenant-Level Storage Limits with Add-On Purchase

		i)	New Console Configuration: Add storage limit settings to tenant configuration:

			1)	Base Storage: Auto-calculated as Max Employees × 500 MB

			2)	Add-On Storage: Admin can manually add purchased storage blocks

			3)	Total Limit: Base Storage + Add-On Storage

			4)	Enforcement: System blocks uploads when total limit reached

		ii)	Benefit:

			1)	✅ Prevents Abuse: Storage capped at reasonable limit

			2)	✅ Predictable Costs: CATAPA can forecast storage costs

			3)	✅ Monetization: Tenants pay for additional storage needs

			4)	✅ Flexibility: Tenants can purchase exactly what they need

			5)	To-do: propose this solution to management and discuss the pricing plan with busdev team.

		iii)	To-do:

			1)	Check the tenant's current usage of storage in the production environment

			2)	Create a requirement for “Add storage limit settings to tenant configuration”.

			3)	Create a pricing proposal for additional storage.

Repository Enhancement

Problem Statement
Problem 1: Inefficient Manual Upload Process
Current Pain Point:

--	Repository only supports one-file-at-a-time upload

--	BCAI needs to upload 1721 A1 certificates for 724 employees annually

--	Manual process is time-consuming (estimated 6-12 hours for 724 files)

--	High risk of human error (wrong file to wrong employee)

--	Not scalable for clients with >1,000 employees

Impact:

--	Poor user experience for HR administrators

--	Delays in employee access to critical documents (tax certificates)

--	Increased support burden on CATAPA team

--	Reduced competitiveness vs. modern HRIS solutions

Problem 2: No ESS Visibility Control
Current Pain Point:

--	No mechanism to control which repository files/groups are visible in ESS

--	All uploaded files are treated equally regardless of sensitivity

--	Cannot differentiate between:

	--	Employee-accessible documents (tax certs, payslips)

	--	Internal HR documents (disciplinary records, notes)

	--	Company-wide policies (handbooks, SOPs)

Impact:

--	Risk of exposing confidential/internal documents to employees

--	Cannot fulfill BCAI's requirement (employees see tax docs, but not internal files)

--	Limits repository usefulness (HR hesitant to upload sensitive docs)

--	Compliance risk (GDPR, Indonesian data protection)

###

Repository Enhancement

Problem 3: No Employee Self-Service Download
Current Pain Point:

--	Employees cannot download repository files from ESS

--	Must request documents from HR/Admin

--	HR must manually send files via email or print

--	No self-service capability

Impact:

--	Defeats the purpose of digitalization

--	High volume of repetitive HR support tickets

--	Poor employee experience (waiting time for documents)

--	Cannot meet BCAI's core requirement

--	HR workload increases unnecessarily

Problem 4: Lack of Document Organization
Current Pain Point:

--	No repository grouping/categorization system

--	All files stored flat without logical structure

--	Difficult to manage different document types (tax forms vs. contracts vs. policies)

--	No standard taxonomy for document organization

Impact:

--	Difficult to search and retrieve specific document types

--	Cannot apply bulk operations by category

--	Cannot set visibility rules by document type

--	Poor scalability (unmanageable with thousands of documents)

Problem 5: Missing Document Generation Integration
Current Pain Point:

--	Employee Documents feature (generates docs) is separate from Repository (stores docs)

--	No automated workflow: generate → store → notify employee

--	Manual steps required to move generated documents to storage

--	No centralized document lifecycle management

Impact:

--	Fragmented user experience (admins use multiple modules)

--	Risk of generated documents not being stored properly

--	No audit trail from generation to employee access

--	Cannot track document lifecycle (created → stored → viewed → downloaded)

Objective and Goals

###

Repository Enhancement

Objective and Goals
Primary Objectives (Must-Have by EOY 2025)
Objective 1: Enable Bulk Document Upload

Goal: Allow HR administrators to upload bulk files simultaneously for multiple employees

Objective 2: Implement ESS Visibility Control

Goal: Provide configuration to control which repository groups/files appear in ESS

Objective 3: Enable Employee Self-Service Download

Goal: Allow employees to view and download their repository files through ESS

Objective 4: Establish Repository Grouping System

Goal: Create logical document categories for organization and bulk operations

Secondary Objectives (Optional/Future Phase)
Objective 5: Integrate Employee Documents with Repository

Goal: Seamless workflow from document generation → automatic storage → employee access

Objective 6: Trustee/Delegation Access

Goal: Allow designated users to access repository files on behalf of others

Assumptions
1)	Proposal Vision for Maximum storage per tenant:

	a)	Currently, CATAPA doesn’t have a total storage limit per tenant.

		i)	[CASE tenant abusing storage] Calculation worst case:

Calculation (Worst Case):

= 10,000 employees × 50 files × 25 MB per file

= 10,000 × 50 × 25

= 12,500,000 MB

= 12,500 GB

= 12.5 TB per tenant

		ii)	Why did this case suddenly become a concern?

			1)	Currently, users have to upload documents one by one, so the chances of this case occurring are still relatively low. However, with the introduction of the massive upload repository feature, the likelihood of users abusing storage may increase because the uploading process becomes much easier through massive upload.

--	Current CATAPA production storage usage:

Repository Enhancement
Assumptions

iv)	Key insight:

			1)	Cost Impact: A single tenant with 10,000 employees using maximum storage limits would increase monthly costs by nearly 1,400% or $1,738.79 USD (Rp 27.8 million).

			2)	Risk Factor: This represents approximately 93% of the total cost in the abuse scenario, despite being only 21% of total users.

			3)	Annual Impact: The abuse would cost an additional $20,865 USD (Rp 333.8 million) per year.

	b)	Current solution: limit storage by limiting the number of employees.

		i)	CATAPA currently enforces employee count limits via console configuration:

			1)	Console Setting: Each tenant has a configurable "Max Employees" limit

			2)	Enforcement: Tenant cannot create more employees than the limit

			3)	Example: A Tenant with limit of 1,000 cannot create the 1,001st employee

		ii)	But this solution did not really solve the potential storage abuse.

	c)	Why the Current Approach Has Potential for Abuse

		i)	No Total Storage Cap

			1)	✅ Employee count: Limited (e.g., 1,000 employees max)

			2)	✅ Files per employee: Limited (50 files max)

			3)	✅ File size: Limited (25 MB max per file)

			4)	❌ Total storage: NOT LIMITED

			5)	Result: 1,000 employees × 50 files × 25 MB = 1,250 GB (1.25 TB) possible

		ii)	Risk 2: Resource Monopolization - Heavy-usage tenants disproportionately consume infrastructure resources, creating inequality across the platform.

		iii)	Risk 3: No Upgrade Path - Legitimate tenants can't purchase additional storage

Tenant legitimately needs more storage:

- Current usage: 600 GB

- Employee count: 1,000 (can't increase without adding employees)

- No mechanism to purchase additional storage ❌

- Tenant is stuck

	d)	Proposal solution: Tenant-Level Storage Limits with Add-On Purchase

###

Repository Enhancement
Assumptions

Tenant legitimately needs more storage:

- Current usage: 600 GB

- Employee count: 1,000 (can't increase without adding employees)

- No mechanism to purchase additional storage ❌

- Tenant is stuck

	d)	Proposal solution: Tenant-Level Storage Limits with Add-On Purchase

		i)	New Console Configuration: Add storage limit settings to tenant configuration:

			1)	Base Storage: Auto-calculated as Max Employees × 500 MB

			2)	Add-On Storage: Admin can manually add purchased storage blocks

			3)	Total Limit: Base Storage + Add-On Storage

			4)	Enforcement: System blocks uploads when total limit reached

		ii)	Benefit:

			1)	✅ Prevents Abuse: Storage capped at reasonable limit

			2)	✅ Predictable Costs: CATAPA can forecast storage costs

			3)	✅ Monetization: Tenants pay for additional storage needs

			4)	✅ Flexibility: Tenants can purchase exactly what they need

			5)	To-do: propose this solution to management and discuss the pricing plan with busdev team.

		iii)	To-do:

			1)	Check the tenant's current usage of storage in the production environment

			2)	Create a requirement for “Add storage limit settings to tenant configuration”.

			3)	Create a pricing proposal for additional storage.

question: Apa alasan penggabungan Laporan Penggajian Tahunan ke dalam Laporan Penggajian Lengkap dan bagaimana peningkatan teknis mendukung pengolahan data dalam skala besar?
expected_response: Penggabungan dilakukan untuk mencegah redundansi laporan dan mempermudah pemeliharaan karena kedua laporan memiliki fungsionalitas yang tumpang tindih. Laporan Penggajian Tahunan sebelumnya memiliki hambatan navigasi karena memisahkan tiap karyawan di sheet berbeda. Dengan penggabungan ini, pengguna dapat memilih rentang periode 1-12 bulan dan seluruh karyawan digabung dalam satu sheet dan satu tabel yang rapi. Dari sisi teknis, sistem beralih menggunakan library SXSSF. Hasil benchmark menunjukkan library ini mampu mengunduh hingga 3.000 karyawan dalam 10 detik (sebelumnya berisiko crashed memory di atas 1.500 karyawan). Selain itu, mekanisme pembulatan THP dipindahkan ke satu kolom tambahan di ujung kanan untuk menjaga kejelasan data asli di kolom utama.

Halo, Pengguna Setia CATAPA!

CATAPA akan menghadirkan *peningkatan fitur* pada *laporan penggajian* pada *08 Mei 2023*. Simak perubahan yang akan kami lakukan di sini:

*Sebelum*

Laporan Penggajian Lengkap hanya mampu:

1)	Download data 1 bulan saja

2)	Mampu download data semua karyawan

Laporan Penggajian Tahunan hanya mampu:

1)	Download data 1 tahun saja

2)	Download karyawan satu-per-satu

3)	Tiap karyawan dipisahkan dalam sheet berbeda di file Excel

*Sesudah*

Kami akan *menggabungkan Laporan Penggajian Tahunan* ke *Laporan Penggajian Lengkap*. Nantinya Laporan Penggajian Lengkap mampu:

1)	Download tidak hanya per 1 bulan, melainkan bisa memilih antara 1-12 bulan.

2)	Tetap mampu download data semua karyawan

3)	Tiap karyawan digabung dalam 1 sheet dan 1 tabel yang sama

4)	Terdapat kolom pembulatan tersendiri

5)	Terdapat baris Total & Grand Total tersendiri

Dengan demikian, Anda bisa langsung menggunakan *1 laporan saja yaitu Laporan Penggajian Lengkap*.

Apabila Anda memiliki pertanyaan lebih lanjut anda dapat menghubungi kami melalui:

—

Email: support@catapa.com

Hotline: 150150 atau

Live Chat (catapa.com) *pada jam operasional 09.00 - 18.00 WIB

—

Kami dengan senang hati akan membantu Anda!

Terima kasih atas perhatiannya.

###

Full-Annual Payroll Report Enhancement
Revision History

Problem Statement
1)	User ingin mendownload laporan untuk semua karyawan, tapi User perlu memilih satu per satu nama karyawan di Annual Payroll Report.

	a)	Sangat memakan waktu dalam penginputan nama karyawan khususnya jika sudah mencapai ratusan/ribuan.

	b)	Belum ada mekanisme untuk memilih karyawan secara bulk/dalam jumlah banyak saat download laporan.

2)	Data penggajian tahunan karyawan dipisah per sheet pada Excel yang terdownload.

	a)	Kesulitan melihat data antar karyawan karena terpisah oleh sheet satu per satu.

	b)	Kesulitan navigasi antar sheet karena Excel tidak menyediakan fungsi Search yang spesifik mencari suatu nama sheet tertentu.

Objective
Meningkatkan kapabilitas download data penggajian tahunan pada Annual Payroll Report agar mampu download data semua karyawan* beserta mengubah format tabel laporan agar lebih efisien untuk dilihat.

Current Implementation
Download Satu per Satu
Laporan Penggajian Tahunan hanya bisa didownload dengan mengetikkan satu per satu nama karyawan. Akan memakan waktu dan merepotkan User untuk memasukkan seluruh nama karyawan.

[image_046bff7c808d58fc]

###

Full-Annual Payroll Report Enhancement
Revision History
Current Implementation

*Internal Capability Benchmark
Telah dilakukan benchmark internal untuk melihat capability fitur download Laporan Penggajian Tahunan saat ini seberapa mampu melakukan download karyawan dalam jumlah besar. Benchmark menggunakan acuan:

1)	Format laporan as-is yang ada di CATAPA saat ini (memisahkan karyawan antar sheet, & memunculkan semua komponen gaji dari tiap proses payroll serta memunculkan total THP)

2)	Mengecek time & consumption untuk download employee sebanyak-banyaknya hingga limit

[17 Feb 2023]

Hasil benchmark adalah sebagai berikut:

1)	Dengan asumsi format report saat ini, direkomendasikan maksimal karyawan yang bisa di-download mencapai 1000 - 1500*. Waktu yang diperlukan untuk generate data sekitar 2-3 menit.

2)	Perlu diketahui bahwa hasil mungkin berbeda dengan format report baru nantinya.

3)	Data karyawan di atas 1500 sudah dalam kondisi memori hampir mencapai limit sehingga apabila lebih dari itu, possible terjadinya crash untuk pengguna CATAPA.

*Untuk kasus Tiket sebagai tenant yang request fitur ini, pada kondisi saat ini, jumlah karyawan Tiket masih memadai untuk di support. Akan tetapi, untuk tenant lain, tetap perlu mekanisme lanjutan apabila perlu download all employees.

[3 Mar 2023]

Hasil benchmark kedua dengan library SXSSF:

1)	Bisa download hingga 3000 employees, dengan kecepatan ~30 detik

2)	Penggunaan memory lebih kecil dari sebelumnya

Revision History
Current Implementation
*Internal Capability Benchmark

- 1000 employee: ~30 detik

- 1500 employee: ~60 detik

- 2000 employee: ~90 detik (memory near limit)

- 3000 employee: crashed out of memory

[3 Mar 2023]

Hasil benchmark kedua dengan library SXSSF:

1)	Bisa download hingga 3000 employees, dengan kecepatan ~30 detik

2)	Penggunaan memory lebih kecil dari sebelumnya

3)	Karena mendownload hingga 3000 employees masih possible, akan dicek limit maksimal dari SXSSF

[13 Mar 2023]

Hasil benchmark ketiga dengan library SXSSF:

1)	Bisa download hingga 20000 employees, total sekitar 260.000+ rows (include 12 bulan & total THP)

2)	Benchmark terbaru

	a)	3000 employees (limit yang dipilih) → 10 detik, size 8.1MB

	b)	20000 employees → 61 detik, size 54MB

Decision

1)	Menggunakan library SXSSF

2)	Memberikan limit 3000 employees karena jumlah user dari tenant terbanyak yang sudah Go-Live maupun yang masih ada di pipeline masih belum mencapai 3000 employees. Jika ada kebutuhan lebih, baru akan dinaikkan limitnya.

[full payroll report.png](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZbzPpWq0zeiW4t9e5JNPMCNdT2ZL1y_W/view?usp=share_link)

Halo, Pengguna Setia CATAPA!

CATAPA akan menghadirkan *peningkatan fitur* pada *laporan penggajian* pada *08 Mei 2023*. Simak perubahan yang akan kami lakukan di sini:

*Sebelum*

Laporan Penggajian Lengkap hanya mampu:

1)	Download data 1 bulan saja

2)	Mampu download data semua karyawan

Laporan Penggajian Tahunan hanya mampu:

1)	Download data 1 tahun saja

2)	Download karyawan satu-per-satu

3)	Tiap karyawan dipisahkan dalam sheet berbeda di file Excel

*Sesudah*

Kami akan *menggabungkan Laporan Penggajian Tahunan* ke *Laporan Penggajian Lengkap*. Nantinya Laporan Penggajian Lengkap mampu:

1)	Download tidak hanya per 1 bulan, melainkan bisa memilih antara 1-12 bulan.

2)	Tetap mampu download data semua karyawan

3)	Tiap karyawan digabung dalam 1 sheet dan 1 tabel yang sama

4)	Terdapat kolom pembulatan tersendiri

5)	Terdapat baris Total & Grand Total tersendiri

Dengan demikian, Anda bisa langsung menggunakan *1 laporan saja yaitu Laporan Penggajian Lengkap*.

Apabila Anda memiliki pertanyaan lebih lanjut anda dapat menghubungi kami melalui:

—

Email: support@catapa.com

Hotline: 150150 atau

Live Chat (catapa.com) *pada jam operasional 09.00 - 18.00 WIB

—

Kami dengan senang hati akan membantu Anda!

Terima kasih atas perhatiannya.

###

Full-Annual Payroll Report Enhancement
Revision History

Problem Statement
1)	User ingin mendownload laporan untuk semua karyawan, tapi User perlu memilih satu per satu nama karyawan di Annual Payroll Report.

	a)	Sangat memakan waktu dalam penginputan nama karyawan khususnya jika sudah mencapai ratusan/ribuan.

	b)	Belum ada mekanisme untuk memilih karyawan secara bulk/dalam jumlah banyak saat download laporan.

2)	Data penggajian tahunan karyawan dipisah per sheet pada Excel yang terdownload.

	a)	Kesulitan melihat data antar karyawan karena terpisah oleh sheet satu per satu.

	b)	Kesulitan navigasi antar sheet karena Excel tidak menyediakan fungsi Search yang spesifik mencari suatu nama sheet tertentu.

Objective
Meningkatkan kapabilitas download data penggajian tahunan pada Annual Payroll Report agar mampu download data semua karyawan* beserta mengubah format tabel laporan agar lebih efisien untuk dilihat.

Current Implementation
Download Satu per Satu
Laporan Penggajian Tahunan hanya bisa didownload dengan mengetikkan satu per satu nama karyawan. Akan memakan waktu dan merepotkan User untuk memasukkan seluruh nama karyawan.

[image_046bff7c808d58fc]

###

Full-Annual Payroll Report Enhancement
Revision History
Current Implementation

*Internal Capability Benchmark
Telah dilakukan benchmark internal untuk melihat capability fitur download Laporan Penggajian Tahunan saat ini seberapa mampu melakukan download karyawan dalam jumlah besar. Benchmark menggunakan acuan:

1)	Format laporan as-is yang ada di CATAPA saat ini (memisahkan karyawan antar sheet, & memunculkan semua komponen gaji dari tiap proses payroll serta memunculkan total THP)

2)	Mengecek time & consumption untuk download employee sebanyak-banyaknya hingga limit

[17 Feb 2023]

Hasil benchmark adalah sebagai berikut:

1)	Dengan asumsi format report saat ini, direkomendasikan maksimal karyawan yang bisa di-download mencapai 1000 - 1500*. Waktu yang diperlukan untuk generate data sekitar 2-3 menit.

2)	Perlu diketahui bahwa hasil mungkin berbeda dengan format report baru nantinya.

3)	Data karyawan di atas 1500 sudah dalam kondisi memori hampir mencapai limit sehingga apabila lebih dari itu, possible terjadinya crash untuk pengguna CATAPA.

*Untuk kasus Tiket sebagai tenant yang request fitur ini, pada kondisi saat ini, jumlah karyawan Tiket masih memadai untuk di support. Akan tetapi, untuk tenant lain, tetap perlu mekanisme lanjutan apabila perlu download all employees.

Internal data:

update hasil benchmark terakhir di development setelah ngilangin RegionUtil.setBorder yang nggak perlu.

datanya dibikin manual duplicate data suatu employee diulang N kali sesuai jumlah employee.

- 1000 employee: ~30 detik

- 1500 employee: ~60 detik

- 2000 employee: ~90 detik (memory near limit)

- 3000 employee: crashed out of memory

[3 Mar 2023]

Hasil benchmark kedua dengan library SXSSF:

1)	Bisa download hingga 3000 employees, dengan kecepatan ~30 detik

2)	Penggunaan memory lebih kecil dari sebelumnya

###

Full-Annual Payroll Report Enhancement
Revision History
Current Implementation
*Internal Capability Benchmark

- 1000 employee: ~30 detik

- 1500 employee: ~60 detik

- 2000 employee: ~90 detik (memory near limit)

- 3000 employee: crashed out of memory

[3 Mar 2023]

Hasil benchmark kedua dengan library SXSSF:

1)	Bisa download hingga 3000 employees, dengan kecepatan ~30 detik

2)	Penggunaan memory lebih kecil dari sebelumnya

3)	Karena mendownload hingga 3000 employees masih possible, akan dicek limit maksimal dari SXSSF

[13 Mar 2023]

Hasil benchmark ketiga dengan library SXSSF:

1)	Bisa download hingga 20000 employees, total sekitar 260.000+ rows (include 12 bulan & total THP)

2)	Benchmark terbaru

	a)	3000 employees (limit yang dipilih) → 10 detik, size 8.1MB

	b)	20000 employees → 61 detik, size 54MB

Decision

1)	Menggunakan library SXSSF

2)	Memberikan limit 3000 employees karena jumlah user dari tenant terbanyak yang sudah Go-Live maupun yang masih ada di pipeline masih belum mencapai 3000 employees. Jika ada kebutuhan lebih, baru akan dinaikkan limitnya.

question: Bagaimana kerangka kerja Multicurrency di CATAPA dirancang untuk mendukung operasional bisnis internasional namun tetap mematuhi regulasi pajak Indonesia?
expected_response: CATAPA mengimplementasikan fitur multicurrency untuk memungkinkan perusahaan memproses gaji dalam berbagai mata uang asing (seperti USD, SGD, atau THB). Sistem menetapkan satu mata uang lokal (IDR) sebagai basis dasar untuk semua perhitungan kurs. Terdapat dua jenis nilai tukar: Payroll Rate untuk pembayaran akhir dan Tax Rate untuk perhitungan pajak. Berdasarkan regulasi pajak Indonesia (PPh 21), semua perhitungan pajak harus dilakukan dalam IDR; oleh karena itu, gaji dalam mata uang asing akan dikonversi ke IDR menggunakan kurs KMK mingguan sebelum dihitung pajaknya. Hasil proses gaji akan menampilkan nilai dalam mata uang asing dan ekuivalen IDR secara dual untuk transparansi. Laporan penggajian tetap dihasilkan dalam mata uang lokal untuk kepatuhan, sementara detail pembayaran akan disesuaikan dengan mata uang rekening bank karyawan.
expected_chunk_automated:
Multicurrency

Background
CATAPA is designed specifically for the Indonesian market. With a commitment to meeting local business needs, CATAPA aims to streamline HR processes while ensuring compliance with local regulations.

Recent trends indicate a growing need among Indonesian companies to manage payroll in various foreign currencies. Many businesses engage in international operations, where employees may prefer to receive their salaries in currencies such as USD, THB, or SGD. Furthermore, Indonesian tax regulations necessitate that all tax calculations be performed in IDR, presenting a challenge for businesses wanting to accommodate diverse payment preferences.

This document aims to explore the feasibility of implementing a multicurrency feature within CATAPA, addressing both customer needs and compliance requirements.

Customer Requests

###

Multicurrency
Background

This document aims to explore the feasibility of implementing a multicurrency feature within CATAPA, addressing both customer needs and compliance requirements.
Customer Requests

|    | 0                                    | 1                            | 2                  | 3                             |
|---:|:-------------------------------------|:-----------------------------|:-------------------|:------------------------------|
|  0 | Tenant Name                          | Input (Base Salary) Currency | Processed Currency | Output (Transferred) Currency |
|  1 | Protelindo                           | USD                          | IDR                | USD                           |
|  2 | AHA Center                           | USD                          | IDR                | IDR                           |
|  3 | ASEAN Foundation                     | USD                          | IDR                | USD                           |
|  4 | Shinto Kogyo                         | USD                          | IDR                | IDR                           |
|  5 | Wagely                               | SGD/USD/BDT                  | IDR                | SGD/USD/BDT                   |
|  6 | Inspiring Generation Pte Ltd         | SGD                          | IDR                | SGD                           |
|  7 | PT GCM Marketing Solutions Indonesia | USD/THB/IDR                  | IDR                | USD/THB/IDR                   |
|  8 | LnData                               | USD                          | IDR                | IDR                           |

###

Multicurrency
Competitive Analysis
Sunfish Workplaze

Indonesian Tax Calculation (PPH 21) from Foreign Currencies
PPH 21 is the income tax imposed on individuals in Indonesia. Employers are responsible for withholding this tax from employee salaries and remitting it to the government. Under Indonesian tax law, all calculations for PPH 21 must be conducted in IDR, regardless of the currency in which the salary is paid.

To effectively calculate PPH 21 for salaries expressed in foreign currencies, the following steps must be taken:

1)	Currency Conversion:

	--	Salaries paid in foreign currencies (e.g., USD, EUR) must first be converted into IDR using the appropriate exchange rate sourced from the Ministry of Finance (KMK). This is necessary to ensure compliance with tax regulations. The KMK provides weekly exchange rates that must be used for tax calculations.

	--	Additionally, for payroll transactions, employers may consider using the Bank Indonesia (BI) exchange rate for operational purposes, but all tax calculations should adhere strictly to the KMK rates.

2)	Applicable Tax Rates:

	--	After conversion, the salary amount in IDR is subjected to the relevant PPH 21 tax rates based on the employee's taxable income bracket.

	--	The tax rates vary depending on the individual's total annual income.

3)	Withholding Tax:

	--	The employer withholds the calculated PPH 21 from the converted salary amount before processing payroll.

	--	The withheld amount must be reported and paid to the tax authority as per regulatory requirements.

4)	Reporting:

	--	Employers must report the total salary paid, the amount withheld for PPH 21, and any foreign currency transactions in their financial records.

	--	The reporting should indicate both the original salary in the foreign currency and the converted amount in IDR.

###

Multicurrency
Solution

Currency and Exchange Rate Setup
--	Local Currency Definition:

	--	Define a local currency that will serve as the primary currency for operations. This local currency will act as the base for all exchange rate calculations.

	--	One tenant can only have one local currency.

	--	For the current situation, the local currency will be defined as Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) and cannot be changed.

		--	Once CATAPA is prepared for global expansion, the system will allow the local currency to be set to the currency of other countries, accommodating international clients.

--	Currency Formatting and Rounding:

	--	Each currency will need to have a defined format, including rounding mechanisms and decimal scales. This ensures that all monetary values are consistently presented according to local financial practices.

--	Exchange Rate Management:

	--	Centralized Management: A dedicated section will be created for managing exchange rates, allowing users to input and adjust rates as needed. This section can include options to set default rates and view historical rates.

	--	Exchange Rate Type: The system will accommodate two types of exchange rates:

		--	Payroll Rate:

			--	Used for calculating the final salary payments to employees.

		--	Tax Rate:

			--	Used for calculating applicable taxes based on the defined local currency.

	--	Effective Date Logic: The effective date of the payment will determine the applicable rate:

		--	If the payment date is greater than the current date, the system will use the current date for calculations.

		--	If the payment date is less than the current date, the system will use the effective date to pull the corresponding rate.

###

Multicurrency
Solution
Currency and Exchange Rate Setup

--	Effective Date Logic: The effective date of the payment will determine the applicable rate:

		--	If the payment date is greater than the current date, the system will use the current date for calculations.

		--	If the payment date is less than the current date, the system will use the effective date to pull the corresponding rate.

	--	Rate Saving per Process: The saved exchange rates will be tied to each payroll process, allowing users to refer to the exact rates used during that specific calculation period.

###

Multicurrency
Solution

Payroll Impact
--	Input:

	--	Each employee can have multiple salary items, with the ability to define the currency for each individual salary item.

	--	Display of Assigned Currency in All Input Forms:

		--	All forms used to input or adjust salary item values (e.g., salary decrees, editable salary forms, etc.) will clearly display the currency assigned to each salary item.

		--	For bulk updates, such as through Excel, the assigned currency for each salary item will also be visible, ensuring that users maintain accuracy during massive data updates.

	--	Local Currency Usage in Non-Salary Item Processes:

		--	Any payroll processes or forms that display currency values but do not utilize salary items will default to displaying amounts in the local currency (IDR).

--	Salary Process:

	--	Exchange Rate Application:

		--	Before performing any calculations, the system will first convert foreign currency values into the local currency (IDR) using the defined exchange rates

			--	Payroll rates for THP calculation

			--	Tax rates for Tax calculation

	--	Calculation Using Local Currency: Once the conversion is complete, all calculations for salary payments and tax liabilities will be performed using the local currency.

--	Output:

	--	Salary Processed Results:

		--	For salary items that do not use the defined local currency, the application should display both the foreign currency and the equivalent local currency amount based on the current exchange rate. This dual display enhances transparency for users.

		--	For any total fields in the application, values will be displayed in the defined local currency. This consistent approach simplifies financial reporting and improves user understanding across various reports and calculations.

	--	Salary Payment:

###

Multicurrency
Solution
Payroll Impact

--	For any total fields in the application, values will be displayed in the defined local currency. This consistent approach simplifies financial reporting and improves user understanding across various reports and calculations.

	--	Salary Payment:

		--	When processing salary payments, the system will provide options to customize the disbursement currency, allowing users to define how payments should be made.

			--	Set currency for payment according to Employee’s Bank Account

		--	Utilization of Payroll Rates:

			--	For conversions, the Payroll exchange rate will be applied to accurately calculate the foreign currency equivalent, ensuring consistency across payment disbursement scenarios.

		--	Enhanced Payment Distribution Details:

			--	A dedicated section will display detailed insights into payment distributions, showing how amounts are allocated across both local and foreign currencies based on the employee bank account

	--	Salary Export:

		--	Format Alignment with Company Bank Account Currency:

			--	Export formats will align with the company bank account currency.

			--	For example:

				--	Use BCA KlikBCA Bisnis Multi Payroll for IDR-to-IDR transactions.

				--	Use KlikBCA Bisnis Outward Remittance for USD-to-USD transactions.

			--	This ensures compatibility with the bank's export requirements while handling various currency transactions.

		--	The system will ensure that only employee bank accounts with currencies supported by the chosen export format are included.

			--	For example:

				--	If an employee's bank account is set to USD, and the selected format is KlikBCA Bisnis Multi Payroll, which does not support USD payments, the employee's data will be excluded from the export.

###

Multicurrency
Solution
Payroll Impact

--	The system will ensure that only employee bank accounts with currencies supported by the chosen export format are included.

			--	For example:

				--	If an employee's bank account is set to USD, and the selected format is KlikBCA Bisnis Multi Payroll, which does not support USD payments, the employee's data will be excluded from the export.

			--	This avoids errors in file generation and ensures compatibility with bank export requirements

	--	Salary Payslip Display:

		--	The system will show the total amount per foreign currency on the salary payslip, similar to the salary payment display.

		--	This will provide employees with a clear understanding of their earnings, including the amounts in both local and foreign currencies.

	--	Payroll Reporting:

		--	All payroll reports will be generated in the local currency to maintain consistency and compliance with local regulations.

		--	To provide insights into currency conversions and exchange rates, a new report will be created. This report will display:

			--	The exchange rates applied for each payroll run.

			--	The results of salary calculations in both local and foreign currencies, facilitating transparency and helping HR teams manage payroll effectively.

			--	Can reuse Payment Item Details

Detailed requirements can be found here: [[Brainstorm] Multicurrency](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y9y4dx50oWIVb_WwUo13TYhLNOwK1yFJgPn8HNgy12Y/edit?gid=1531659489#gid=1531659489)

2)	Applicable Tax Rates:

	--	After conversion, the salary amount in IDR is subjected to the relevant PPH 21 tax rates based on the employee's taxable income bracket.

	--	The tax rates vary depending on the individual's total annual income.

3)	Withholding Tax:

	--	The employer withholds the calculated PPH 21 from the converted salary amount before processing payroll.

	--	The withheld amount must be reported and paid to the tax authority as per regulatory requirements.

4)	Reporting:

	--	Employers must report the total salary paid, the amount withheld for PPH 21, and any foreign currency transactions in their financial records.

	--	The reporting should indicate both the original salary in the foreign currency and the converted amount in IDR.

###

Multicurrency
Solution

Currency and Exchange Rate Setup
--	Local Currency Definition:

	--	Define a local currency that will serve as the primary currency for operations. This local currency will act as the base for all exchange rate calculations.

	--	One tenant can only have one local currency.

	--	For the current situation, the local currency will be defined as Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) and cannot be changed.

		--	Once CATAPA is prepared for global expansion, the system will allow the local currency to be set to the currency of other countries, accommodating international clients.

--	Currency Formatting and Rounding:

	--	Each currency will need to have a defined format, including rounding mechanisms and decimal scales. This ensures that all monetary values are consistently presented according to local financial practices.

--	Exchange Rate Management:

	--	Centralized Management: A dedicated section will be created for managing exchange rates, allowing users to input and adjust rates as needed. This section can include options to set default rates and view historical rates.

	--	Exchange Rate Type: The system will accommodate two types of exchange rates:

		--	Payroll Rate:

			--	Used for calculating the final salary payments to employees.

		--	Tax Rate:

			--	Used for calculating applicable taxes based on the defined local currency.

	--	Effective Date Logic: The effective date of the payment will determine the applicable rate:

		--	If the payment date is greater than the current date, the system will use the current date for calculations.

		--	If the payment date is less than the current date, the system will use the effective date to pull the corresponding rate.

###

Multicurrency
Solution
Currency and Exchange Rate Setup

--	Effective Date Logic: The effective date of the payment will determine the applicable rate:

		--	If the payment date is greater than the current date, the system will use the current date for calculations.

		--	If the payment date is less than the current date, the system will use the effective date to pull the corresponding rate.

	--	Rate Saving per Process: The saved exchange rates will be tied to each payroll process, allowing users to refer to the exact rates used during that specific calculation period.

###

Multicurrency
Solution

Payroll Impact
--	Input:

	--	Each employee can have multiple salary items, with the ability to define the currency for each individual salary item.

	--	Display of Assigned Currency in All Input Forms:

		--	All forms used to input or adjust salary item values (e.g., salary decrees, editable salary forms, etc.) will clearly display the currency assigned to each salary item.

		--	For bulk updates, such as through Excel, the assigned currency for each salary item will also be visible, ensuring that users maintain accuracy during massive data updates.

	--	Local Currency Usage in Non-Salary Item Processes:

		--	Any payroll processes or forms that display currency values but do not utilize salary items will default to displaying amounts in the local currency (IDR).

--	Salary Process:

	--	Exchange Rate Application:

		--	Before performing any calculations, the system will first convert foreign currency values into the local currency (IDR) using the defined exchange rates

			--	Payroll rates for THP calculation

			--	Tax rates for Tax calculation

	--	Calculation Using Local Currency: Once the conversion is complete, all calculations for salary payments and tax liabilities will be performed using the local currency.

--	Output:

	--	Salary Processed Results:

		--	For salary items that do not use the defined local currency, the application should display both the foreign currency and the equivalent local currency amount based on the current exchange rate. This dual display enhances transparency for users.

		--	For any total fields in the application, values will be displayed in the defined local currency. This consistent approach simplifies financial reporting and improves user understanding across various reports and calculations.

	--	Salary Payment:

###

Multicurrency
Solution
Payroll Impact

--	For any total fields in the application, values will be displayed in the defined local currency. This consistent approach simplifies financial reporting and improves user understanding across various reports and calculations.

	--	Salary Payment:

		--	When processing salary payments, the system will provide options to customize the disbursement currency, allowing users to define how payments should be made.

			--	Set currency for payment according to Employee’s Bank Account

		--	Utilization of Payroll Rates:

			--	For conversions, the Payroll exchange rate will be applied to accurately calculate the foreign currency equivalent, ensuring consistency across payment disbursement scenarios.

		--	Enhanced Payment Distribution Details:

			--	A dedicated section will display detailed insights into payment distributions, showing how amounts are allocated across both local and foreign currencies based on the employee bank account

	--	Salary Export:

		--	Format Alignment with Company Bank Account Currency:

			--	Export formats will align with the company bank account currency.

			--	For example:

				--	Use BCA KlikBCA Bisnis Multi Payroll for IDR-to-IDR transactions.

				--	Use KlikBCA Bisnis Outward Remittance for USD-to-USD transactions.

			--	This ensures compatibility with the bank's export requirements while handling various currency transactions.

		--	The system will ensure that only employee bank accounts with currencies supported by the chosen export format are included.

			--	For example:

				--	If an employee's bank account is set to USD, and the selected format is KlikBCA Bisnis Multi Payroll, which does not support USD payments, the employee's data will be excluded from the export.

###

Multicurrency
Solution
Payroll Impact

--	The system will ensure that only employee bank accounts with currencies supported by the chosen export format are included.

			--	For example:

				--	If an employee's bank account is set to USD, and the selected format is KlikBCA Bisnis Multi Payroll, which does not support USD payments, the employee's data will be excluded from the export.

			--	This avoids errors in file generation and ensures compatibility with bank export requirements

	--	Salary Payslip Display:

		--	The system will show the total amount per foreign currency on the salary payslip, similar to the salary payment display.

		--	This will provide employees with a clear understanding of their earnings, including the amounts in both local and foreign currencies.

	--	Payroll Reporting:

		--	All payroll reports will be generated in the local currency to maintain consistency and compliance with local regulations.

		--	To provide insights into currency conversions and exchange rates, a new report will be created. This report will display:

			--	The exchange rates applied for each payroll run.

			--	The results of salary calculations in both local and foreign currencies, facilitating transparency and helping HR teams manage payroll effectively.

			--	Can reuse Payment Item Details

Detailed requirements can be found here: [[Brainstorm] Multicurrency](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Y9y4dx50oWIVb_WwUo13TYhLNOwK1yFJgPn8HNgy12Y/edit?gid=1531659489#gid=1531659489)

question: Bagaimana CATAPA memfasilitasi kebutuhan fleksibilitas periode cicilan pertama pinjaman dan mekanisme apa yang disediakan untuk melacak riwayat pinjaman karyawan secara komprehensif?
expected_response:
CATAPA memberikan fleksibilitas melalui 3 opsi konfigurasi saat menambahkan loan type: 
(1) jatuh pada 1 periode setelah pencairan (default), 
(2) jatuh pada periode yang sama dengan pencairan, atau 
(3) memberikan pilihan kepada karyawan/admin saat input data. Untuk mendukung pelacakan, tersedia laporan Full Loan Record Report yang mencakup status pinjaman (Berjalan atau Diselesaikan) dengan rentang waktu maksimal 1 tahun. 

Selain itu, terdapat laporan Employee Loan Record History yang terdiri dari dua sheet (Summary dan Detail) untuk melihat total pinjaman yang pernah berjalan tanpa filter periode waktu tertentu. Seluruh aktivitas ini dicatat dalam Loan Log yang mencakup detail penambahan, penghapusan, hingga persetujuan pinjaman baik dari aplikasi maupun ESS.

		i)	Apabila loan disbursement date jatuh pada tanggal 20 Juli 2023, maka cicilan pertama akan jatuh pada tanggal 20 Juli 2023 juga

		i)	Ketika input start period, maka maksimum input start period adalah seusai dengan value end period saat ini

		ii)	Ketika input end period, maka maksimum input end period adalah sesuai dengan value start period saat ini

question: Berdasarkan regulasi PP No. 51 Tahun 2023, bagaimana CATAPA mengotomatisasi pembaruan UMP dan UMK serta bagaimana hal tersebut ditampilkan kepada pengguna untuk menjaga kepatuhan?
expected_response: Pembaruan dilakukan berdasarkan ketetapan pemerintah provinsi tentang kenaikan UMP 2024 sebagai acuan pengupahan minimum daerah tingkat I dan UMK untuk daerah tingkat II. CATAPA melakukan pembaruan data master secara otomatis untuk setiap lokasi yang terdaftar bagi seluruh tenant. Pengguna dapat memantau data ini melalui halaman UMP Master, di mana sistem akan menampilkan nominal UMP/UMK hanya untuk lokasi bisnis yang relevan dengan tenant tersebut agar mereka tetap fokus. Jika suatu lokasi telah mengumumkan UMK, maka nilai UMK yang akan ditampilkan; namun jika belum ada atau UMK sama dengan UMP, maka nilai UMP yang muncul. Sistem juga menyediakan data historis tahun berjalan dan tahun sebelumnya untuk memudahkan pelacakan audit.

## 
Background
Pemerintah provinsi di Indonesia telah menetapkan kenaikan Upah Minimum Provinsi (UMP) tahun 2024. Kenaikan UMP ini dilakukan berdasarkan Peraturan Pemerintah (PP) Nomor 51 Tahun 2023 tentang Perubahan atas Peraturan Pemerintah Nomor 36 Tahun 2021 tentang Pengupahan. UMP yang ditetapkan menjadi acuan pengupahan minimum pada daerah tingkat I. Selain UMP, setiap daerah juga telah menentukan Upah Minimum Kota/Kabupaten (UMK) yang berlaku di daerah tingkat II.

Untuk mempermudah penggunanya, CATAPA melakukan pembaruan UMP dan UMK secara otomatis untuk setiap lokasi yang terdaftar di CATAPA.

Objective
1)	Menambahkan data master UMP dan UMK untuk setiap lokasi yang terdaftar di CATAPA untuk setiap tenant pengguna CATAPA.

Solution
Menambahkan data UMP dan UMK dengan proses berikut:

[image_a7af772f19a17ba1][image_fe5d042363439698]
