question: Bagaimana mekanisme peningkatan validasi data bank dilakukan untuk mencegah false information dan apa kebijakan sistem jika ditemukan ketidaklengkapan data rekening saat pembayaran gaji?
expected_response: CATAPA meningkatkan validasi pada Massive Update untuk memastikan format data sesuai (STRING) dan memberikan pesan kesalahan yang jelas jika data gagal, alih-alih menampilkan pesan sukses padahal data tidak terupdate. Validasi kini mencakup panjang digit nomor rekening, di mana secara umum minimal 9 digit, namun khusus untuk Bank BCA wajib tepat 10 digit. Jika saat proses Salary Payment ditemukan bahwa Payment Method adalah Bank Transfer namun data Bank Account kosong, sistem akan menampilkan infobox edukasi atau validation modal. Secara otomatis, sistem akan mengubah metode pembayaran menjadi Cash untuk karyawan tersebut agar proses tetap dapat berjalan meskipun informasi bank tidak lengkap.
expected_chunk_automated:
Bank Account Massive Update Validation + Enhancement
Revision History

Background
Sebelum melakukan proses pada CATAPA, user perlu melakukan update data bank dari karyawan. Update dapat dilakukan secara individu maupun massal. Ketika melakukan update secara massal, ada beberapa pain points yang dirasakan user:

1)	[SOLVED BUG FIX, NEED MORE IMPROVEMENT] Kebingungan karena data berhasil terupload tetapi data bank karyawan tidak berubah

	a)	Hal ini terjadi karena format data pada excel yang digunakan bukan bertipe STRING (tidak ada segitiga hijau pada excel ketika dibuka). Ketika upload tampil data berhasil namun tidak ada update pada data karyawan

	b)	Sudah diperbaiki, data dapat diupload meskipun tidak bertipe STRING

	c)	Sistem sekarang dapat menerima data character dan tetap memunculkan pesan berhasil. Meskipun berhasil, data Payment Method karyawan tidak akan berubah

	d)	Perlu adanya validasi untuk memastikan format data sesuai dan agar status yang tampil sesuai

2)	User dapat melakukan pembayaran gaji menggunakan Bank Transfer meskipun Bank Account kosong

	a)	User yang sudah melakukan update Payment Method Bank Transfer bisa saja belum memasukkan informasi Bank Account

	b)	Ketika dilakukan Salary Payment, proses tetap berjalan. Namun, Payment Method karyawan berubah menjadi Cash

	c)	Behavior expected karena tidak ada informasi Bank Account. Namun, tidak ada konfirmasi ketika ingin melakukan pemrosesan. User bisa saja tidak menyadari adanya perubahan Payment Method

	d)	Perlu adanya enhancement untuk meminimalisir human error

Objective
1)	Memastikan data dapat terupdate dengan sesuai

2)	Memastikan tidak ada false information dari sistem ke user

3)	Mengurangi possible human error dari user

###

Bank Account Massive Update Validation + Enhancement
Revision History

Objective
1)	Memastikan data dapat terupdate dengan sesuai

2)	Memastikan tidak ada false information dari sistem ke user

3)	Mengurangi possible human error dari user

Current Implementation
1)	Bank Account Validation

	a)	Validasi tidak menampilkan informasi ke user. Validasi dilakukan untuk menjaga agar field yang tidak sesuai tidak terupdate. Namun, tidak ada informasi ke user bahwa format data yang diupload tidak sesuai.

	b)	Jika Payment Method diisi Bank Transfer namun Bank Account kosong, akan tetap berhasil namun data tidak terupdate

	c)	Jika field Bank Account number diisi string, akan tetap berhasil namun data tidak terupdate

	d)	Jika field Bank Account number diisi angka < 9 dikit, akan tetap berhasil namun data tidak terupdate

2)	Empty Bank Account

	a)	Payment Method otomatis berubah menjadi Cash ketika terjadi salary payment dengan empty bank account payment method bank transfer

###

Bank Account Massive Update Validation + Enhancement
Revision History

Alternative Solution
1)        Bank Account Massive Update Validation

        a)        Jika data sesuai, informasi ke user data berhasil, data karyawan terupdate

        b)        Jika data tidak sesuai (ada format yang tidak tepat), informasi ke user data gagal, data karyawan tidak terupdate, dan user dapat melakukan download excel berisi error message

        c)        Dapat menggunakan [POJO Validation](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NAUhiAL9lOGFXxOsgp5UlkxZndBqgIM00PJ02YXLCDM/edit?usp=sharing) (sudah diterapkan di TM) untuk menampilkan multiple error data

        d)        Validation ketika input Bank Transfer pada sheet pertama namun mengosongkan Bank Account, data tidak akan berhasil terupdate (Payment Method tetap KOSONG)

2)        Empty Bank Account Enhancement

        a)        Menampilkan infobox ketika akan melakukan Salary Payment

                i)        Mengedukasi bahwa Payment Method akan berubah menjadi Cash jika ada ketidaklengkapan Bank Account

                ii)        Fast to develop, namun kemungkinan user melakukan kesalahan juga tinggi

        b)        Menampilkan validation modal ketika akan melakukan Salary Payment

                i)        Akan ditampilkan karyawan dengan Bank Account kosong

                        1)        Opsi 1: Karyawan dengan Bank Account kosong tidak dapat diproses

                                a)        Need more effort on BE, less human error

                        2)        Opsi 2: Menampilkan informasi bahwa karyawan dengan Bank Account kosong akan berganti Payment Method menjadi Cash

                ii)        Sebagai catatan, untuk BCA menggunakan 10 digit Bank Account

                iii)        Dibutuhkan effort lebih untuk pengecekan Bank Account. Dapat meningkatkan waktu loading

Objective
1)	Memastikan untuk setiap nomor rekening bank yang diinput oleh user sudah sesuai dengan ketentuan digit masing-masing Bank

2)	Mengurangi human error memasukkan nomor rekening bank baik kurang/lebih dari jumlah digit sesuai dengan ketentuan masing-masing bank

Current Implementation
1)	Bank Account Number Validation

	a)	Wajib mengisikan nomor rekening bank dengan ketentuan minimal 9 digit

	b)	Berlaku untuk seluruh Bank yang sudah terdaftar

Customer Request
1)	BCA Magang Mahasiswa

	a)	Menginginkan agar ketika input nomor rekening bank BCA wajib diisikan dengan 10 digit

	b)	Sebelumnya sempat terjadi kesalahan input nomor rekening bank tidak sama dengan 10 digit dan baru diketahui ketika proses pembayaran

###

Bank Account Number Digit Validation
Revision History

Solution
1)	Menambahkan 2 field tambahan pada master bank untuk ketentuan

	a)	Jumlah digit minimum nomor rekening bank

	b)	Jumlah digit maksimum nomor rekening bank

2)	Untuk saat ini, cukup menambahkan validasi nomor rekening bank BCA saja yang mana harus tepat 10 digit ketika input

	a)	Untuk case seperti ini jumlah digit min dan max bisa diisi dengan value 10

3)	Sistem akan memberikan error message apabila ketika user input nomor rekening dengan bank BCA tidak tepat 10 digit ketika:

	a)	Error Message Template:

		i)	EN: {Data label} "{input}" is incorrect, it {must/not be or have/not} {requirement}.
ID: {Data label} "{input}" salah, data {harus/tidak boleh} {requirement}.

	b)	Input via Bank Account massive update

		i)	Case Exact Length sample:

			1)	EN: Bank account number "{input}" is incorrect, it must have an exact length of {digit}.

			2)	ID: Nomor rekening bank “{input}” salah, data harus memiliki panjang sebesar {digit}.

		ii)	Case < Minimum Length or > Maximum Length sample:

			1)	EN: Bank account number "{input}" is incorrect, it must have a length of {min} to {max}.

			2)	ID: Nomor rekening bank “{input}” salah, data harus memiliki panjang sebesar {min} hingga {max}.

		iii)	Accumulative Error:

			1)	EN: Bank account number is incorrect, it must meet the specified length requirements.

			2)	ID: Nomor rekening bank salah, data harus memiliki panjang sesuai dengan ketentuan.

	c)	Input manual via Apps

		i)	Case Exact Length sample:

			1)	EN: Bank account number "{input}" is incorrect, it must have an exact length of {digit}.

			2)	ID: Nomor rekening bank “{input}” salah, data harus memiliki panjang sebesar {digit}.

		ii)	Case < Minimum Length or > Maximum Length sample:

question: Bagaimana mekanisme penentuan kelayakan dan dampak implementasi kebijakan PPh 21 DTP 2025 bagi perusahaan industri padat karya di CATAPA?
expected_response: Penerapan Kebijakan PPh 21 Ditanggung Pemerintah (DTP) 2025 diatur berdasarkan PMK Nomor 10 Tahun 2025 untuk industri padat karya . Tujuan utamanya adalah mengimplementasikan mekanisme identifikasi kelayakan karyawan berdasarkan klasifikasi penghasilan agar perhitungan pajak akurat . Karyawan tetap dinyatakan layak jika penghasilan tetap dan teraturnya di bulan Januari 2025 atau bulan pertama kerja di 2025 adalah ≤ Rp10 juta . Berbeda dengan karyawan tetap, kelayakan karyawan tidak tetap dievaluasi setiap bulan berdasarkan penghasilan per periode penggajian tersebut . Jika dinyatakan layak, pajak yang ditanggung pemerintah akan dianggap sebagai penghasilan tambahan sehingga meningkatkan Take Home Pay (THP) karyawan . CATAPA memilih solusi penggunaan halaman terpisah untuk memilih komponen "Fixed & Regular Income" guna memudahkan penghapusan fitur ini setelah tahun 2025 berakhir.
expected_chunk_automated:
Tax DTP 2025

Background
The Indonesian government has introduced [PMK No. 10 of 2025](https://jdih.kemenkeu.go.id/dok/pmk-10-tahun-2025), allowing employees working in labor-intensive industries to have their employees' PPh 21 (income tax) covered by the government (DTP) as part of an economic stimulus package.

Eligible employees will have their income tax fully covered by the government, and companies must ensure correct tax calculations, payroll processing, and reporting to Coretax using templates BPMP, BPA1, and BP21.

CATAPA Payroll must implement a seamless, accurate, and compliant solution to handle this PPh 21 DTP requirement while ensuring minimal disruption to payroll operations.

Customer Requests
Government Regulation that needs to be implemented.

Problem Statement
Currently, CATAPA Payroll does not support the new eligibility criteria and flagging mechanism required for PPh 21 DTP in 2025. This leads to:

--	No clear way for companies to enable/disable DTP policy in payroll settings.

--	No automated way to determine which employees qualify for PPh 21 DTP based on new government regulations.

--	No method for identifying and tagging “fixed and regular income” used to validate DTP eligibility.

--	Lack of integration with Coretax reporting to reflect DTP status in tax reports.

Without these enhancements, companies will face compliance risks and manual workarounds for managing DTP eligibility.

###

Tax DTP 2025

Objective
The goal of this project is to:

✅ Allow companies to enable/disable PPh 21 DTP policy at the payroll settings level.

✅ Implement a mechanism to identify employees eligible for PPh 21 DTP based on income classification.

✅ Ensure accurate tax calculations, applying DTP only for employees who qualify.

✅ Provide proper payroll processing, salary slip updates, and undo mechanisms for changes in eligibility.

✅ Ensure correct reporting to Coretax, reflecting DTP status in the designated “Fasilitas” field.

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution
(B) DTP Eligibility for Permanent vs. Temporary Employees

--	Add a "PPh 21 DTP 2025 Policy" setting in Tax Policy (toggle ON/OFF).
--	If enabled, DTP applies to all employees following the eligibility rules.
--	If disabled, standard PPh 21 deduction applies.
(B) DTP Eligibility for Permanent vs. Temporary Employees

|    | 0             | 1                    | 2                                                                                                                 |
|---:|:--------------|:---------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|  0 | Employee Type | Tax Object Code      | Eligibility Rule                                                                                                  |
|  1 | Permanent     | 21-100-01, 21-100-32 | Based on fixed & regular income in January 2025 (or first working month in 2025) is ≤ Rp10 million.               |
|    |               |                      |                                                                                                                   |
|    |               |                      | This amount is locked for the full year unless the January 2025 payroll is undone and modified.                   |
|  2 | Temporary     | 21-100-35, 21-100-27 | Evaluated every payroll month (not locked like permanent employees) for fixed & regular income is ≤ Rp10 million. |

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution

(C) Identifying Fixed & Regular Income
--	There are several approaches to identifying fixed & regular income. We will see the alternative approach below.

(D) Tax Calculation
--	During tax calculation, the system:

	--	Firstly will check if the DTP 2025 Policy is enabled or not.

	--	If enabled, the system checks the flagged salary items during tax calculation for each month to determine DTP eligibility.

	--	Permanent Employees

		--	If the total Fixed & Regular Income in January 2025 (or first employment month in 2025) is ≤ Rp10M, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.

		--	If eligible, an additional salary item for DTP is filled with value, reflecting the PPh 21 DTP amount.

	--	Temporary Employees

		--	If the total Fixed & Regular Income in each month is ≤ Rp10M, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.

		--	If eligible, an additional salary item for DTP is filled with value, reflecting the PPh 21 DTP amount.

--	The tax covered by the government will be considered additional income, including cases where the tax method includes a tax allowance. As a result, the net take-home pay (THP) will increase.

--	If the total tax paid by the government (DTP) exceeds the employee’s actual tax liability at the end of the year (December 2025), the excess amount will not be refunded to the employee. As a result, the net take-home pay (THP) will not increase.

--	If payroll for January 2025 is undone, the system re-evaluates eligibility based on the updated salary item amounts.

(E) Reporting & Compliance
--	Coretax export templates (BPMP, BPA1, BP21) must correctly reflect DTP in the "Fasilitas" field.

--	Salary slips must include a label stating “PPh 21 Ditanggung Pemerintah.”

Approaches to Identify Fixed & Regular Income

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution
(E) Reporting & Compliance
Approaches to Identify Fixed & Regular Income

(E) Reporting & Compliance
--	Coretax export templates (BPMP, BPA1, BP21) must correctly reflect DTP in the "Fasilitas" field.
--	Salary slips must include a label stating “PPh 21 Ditanggung Pemerintah.”
Approaches to Identify Fixed & Regular Income

|    | 0   | 1                                                  | 2                                                                                                            | 3                                                                                                                         | 4            | 5       |
|---:|:----|:---------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------|:--------|
|  0 | No  | Approach                                           | Pros                                                                                                         | Cons                                                                                                                      | Effort Level | Chosen? |
|  1 | 1   | Manual Checkbox in Salary Item Master              | High flexibility, allows per-item control                                                                    | Requires manual selection, more setup effort, not scalable due possibility will be removed after 2025, more coupled       | Medium       | ❌ No   |
|  2 | 2   | Auto-classify Tax Items 01-06                      | Fast, no manual setup                                                                                        | Inflexible, assumes all tax items 01-06 are Fixed & Regular                                                               | Low          | ❌ No   |
|  3 | 3   | Scripting-Based Approach                           | Highly customizable, supports complex payroll setups                                                         | CATAPA will maintain the script, not re-using existing DTP 2020 mechanism since it will be another salary item for script | Low          | ❌ No   |
|  4 | 4   | Separate Page for Selecting Fixed & Regular Income | Reduces complexity in Salary Item Master, easier to remove post-2025, can re-use existing DTP 2020 mechanism | Adds a new UI section, still requires manual setup                                                                        | Medium       | ✅ Yes  |
|  5 | 5   | Direct DTP Flag in Tax Membership                  | Minimum development effort, user directly assigns DTP eligibility                                            | No automatic eligibility check, risk of incorrect DTP assignments                                                         | Very Low     | ❌ No   |

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution
(E) Reporting & Compliance

System Requirements
1)	Tax Policy

	--	DTP calculations only apply to payroll processed from January 2025 to December 2025.

	--	New toggle to enable PPh21 DTP 2025 Policy (Yes/No). Wording:

		i)	EN:

		ii)	ID:

	--	There will be infobox to explain about the policy:

		i)	EN:

		ii)	ID:

2)	Selecting Fixed & Regular Income

	--	When the DTP Policy is enabled, show multi-checkbox to select which salary items are treated as fixed & regular income.

	--	There will be a tooltip to explain about the field.

		i)	EN:

		ii)	ID:

	--	Scope: Only Individual, Job Level, & Job Title Salary Item that can be selected as fixed & regular income.

		i)	Load all salary items from the category on the multi-checkbox.

3)	Tax Calculation

	--	DTP is only applied for payroll processed from January 2025 onward.

	--	DTP is only applied for Monthly Paygroup.

	--	During tax calculation, the system:

		i)	Check if the DTP 2025 Policy is enabled or not.

		ii)	If enabled, then during tax calculation for each month from January 2025, the system checks and sum all the flagged salary items to determine DTP eligibility. This process must be done on Payroll Process because Job Level & Job Title is calculated when doing Payroll Process.

		iii)	Permanent Employees

			1)	If all the total Fixed & Regular Income is ≤ Rp10.000.000 in January 2025 or first employment month in 2025, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.

			2)	If eligible, use the existing salary item D12 - Tunjangan Pemerintah to be filled with value, reflecting the PPh 21 DTP amount.

		iv)	Temporary Employees

			1)	If all the total Fixed & Regular Income in one month is ≤ Rp10.000.000, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.
expected_chunk:
Tax DTP 2025

Background
The Indonesian government has introduced [PMK No. 10 of 2025](https://jdih.kemenkeu.go.id/dok/pmk-10-tahun-2025), allowing employees working in labor-intensive industries to have their employees' PPh 21 (income tax) covered by the government (DTP) as part of an economic stimulus package.

Eligible employees will have their income tax fully covered by the government, and companies must ensure correct tax calculations, payroll processing, and reporting to Coretax using templates BPMP, BPA1, and BP21.

CATAPA Payroll must implement a seamless, accurate, and compliant solution to handle this PPh 21 DTP requirement while ensuring minimal disruption to payroll operations.

Customer Requests
Government Regulation that needs to be implemented.

Problem Statement
Currently, CATAPA Payroll does not support the new eligibility criteria and flagging mechanism required for PPh 21 DTP in 2025. This leads to:

--	No clear way for companies to enable/disable DTP policy in payroll settings.

--	No automated way to determine which employees qualify for PPh 21 DTP based on new government regulations.

--	No method for identifying and tagging “fixed and regular income” used to validate DTP eligibility.

--	Lack of integration with Coretax reporting to reflect DTP status in tax reports.

Without these enhancements, companies will face compliance risks and manual workarounds for managing DTP eligibility.

###

Tax DTP 2025

Objective
The goal of this project is to:

✅ Allow companies to enable/disable PPh 21 DTP policy at the payroll settings level.

✅ Implement a mechanism to identify employees eligible for PPh 21 DTP based on income classification.

✅ Ensure accurate tax calculations, applying DTP only for employees who qualify.

✅ Provide proper payroll processing, salary slip updates, and undo mechanisms for changes in eligibility.

✅ Ensure correct reporting to Coretax, reflecting DTP status in the designated “Fasilitas” field.

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution
(B) DTP Eligibility for Permanent vs. Temporary Employees

--	Add a "PPh 21 DTP 2025 Policy" setting in Tax Policy (toggle ON/OFF).
--	If enabled, DTP applies to all employees following the eligibility rules.
--	If disabled, standard PPh 21 deduction applies.
(B) DTP Eligibility for Permanent vs. Temporary Employees

|    | 0             | 1                    | 2                                                                                                                 |
|---:|:--------------|:---------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|  0 | Employee Type | Tax Object Code      | Eligibility Rule                                                                                                  |
|  1 | Permanent     | 21-100-01, 21-100-32 | Based on fixed & regular income in January 2025 (or first working month in 2025) is ≤ Rp10 million.               |
|    |               |                      |                                                                                                                   |
|    |               |                      | This amount is locked for the full year unless the January 2025 payroll is undone and modified.                   |
|  2 | Temporary     | 21-100-35, 21-100-27 | Evaluated every payroll month (not locked like permanent employees) for fixed & regular income is ≤ Rp10 million. |

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution

(C) Identifying Fixed & Regular Income
--	There are several approaches to identifying fixed & regular income. We will see the alternative approach below.

(D) Tax Calculation
--	During tax calculation, the system:

	--	Firstly will check if the DTP 2025 Policy is enabled or not.

	--	If enabled, the system checks the flagged salary items during tax calculation for each month to determine DTP eligibility.

	--	Permanent Employees

		--	If the total Fixed & Regular Income in January 2025 (or first employment month in 2025) is ≤ Rp10M, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.

		--	If eligible, an additional salary item for DTP is filled with value, reflecting the PPh 21 DTP amount.

	--	Temporary Employees

		--	If the total Fixed & Regular Income in each month is ≤ Rp10M, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.

		--	If eligible, an additional salary item for DTP is filled with value, reflecting the PPh 21 DTP amount.

--	The tax covered by the government will be considered additional income, including cases where the tax method includes a tax allowance. As a result, the net take-home pay (THP) will increase.

--	If the total tax paid by the government (DTP) exceeds the employee’s actual tax liability at the end of the year (December 2025), the excess amount will not be refunded to the employee. As a result, the net take-home pay (THP) will not increase.

--	If payroll for January 2025 is undone, the system re-evaluates eligibility based on the updated salary item amounts.

(E) Reporting & Compliance
--	Coretax export templates (BPMP, BPA1, BP21) must correctly reflect DTP in the "Fasilitas" field.

--	Salary slips must include a label stating “PPh 21 Ditanggung Pemerintah.”

Approaches to Identify Fixed & Regular Income

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution
(E) Reporting & Compliance
Approaches to Identify Fixed & Regular Income

(E) Reporting & Compliance
--	Coretax export templates (BPMP, BPA1, BP21) must correctly reflect DTP in the "Fasilitas" field.
--	Salary slips must include a label stating “PPh 21 Ditanggung Pemerintah.”
Approaches to Identify Fixed & Regular Income

|    | 0   | 1                                                  | 2                                                                                                            | 3                                                                                                                         | 4            | 5       |
|---:|:----|:---------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------|:--------|
|  0 | No  | Approach                                           | Pros                                                                                                         | Cons                                                                                                                      | Effort Level | Chosen? |
|  1 | 1   | Manual Checkbox in Salary Item Master              | High flexibility, allows per-item control                                                                    | Requires manual selection, more setup effort, not scalable due possibility will be removed after 2025, more coupled       | Medium       | ❌ No   |
|  2 | 2   | Auto-classify Tax Items 01-06                      | Fast, no manual setup                                                                                        | Inflexible, assumes all tax items 01-06 are Fixed & Regular                                                               | Low          | ❌ No   |
|  3 | 3   | Scripting-Based Approach                           | Highly customizable, supports complex payroll setups                                                         | CATAPA will maintain the script, not re-using existing DTP 2020 mechanism since it will be another salary item for script | Low          | ❌ No   |
|  4 | 4   | Separate Page for Selecting Fixed & Regular Income | Reduces complexity in Salary Item Master, easier to remove post-2025, can re-use existing DTP 2020 mechanism | Adds a new UI section, still requires manual setup                                                                        | Medium       | ✅ Yes  |
|  5 | 5   | Direct DTP Flag in Tax Membership                  | Minimum development effort, user directly assigns DTP eligibility                                            | No automatic eligibility check, risk of incorrect DTP assignments                                                         | Very Low     | ❌ No   |

###

Tax DTP 2025
Solution
(E) Reporting & Compliance

System Requirements
1)	Tax Policy

	--	DTP calculations only apply to payroll processed from January 2025 to December 2025.

	--	New toggle to enable PPh21 DTP 2025 Policy (Yes/No). Wording:

		i)	EN:

		ii)	ID:

	--	There will be infobox to explain about the policy:

		i)	EN:

		ii)	ID:

2)	Selecting Fixed & Regular Income

	--	When the DTP Policy is enabled, show multi-checkbox to select which salary items are treated as fixed & regular income.

	--	There will be a tooltip to explain about the field.

		i)	EN:

		ii)	ID:

	--	Scope: Only Individual, Job Level, & Job Title Salary Item that can be selected as fixed & regular income.

		i)	Load all salary items from the category on the multi-checkbox.

3)	Tax Calculation

	--	DTP is only applied for payroll processed from January 2025 onward.

	--	DTP is only applied for Monthly Paygroup.

	--	During tax calculation, the system:

		i)	Check if the DTP 2025 Policy is enabled or not.

		ii)	If enabled, then during tax calculation for each month from January 2025, the system checks and sum all the flagged salary items to determine DTP eligibility. This process must be done on Payroll Process because Job Level & Job Title is calculated when doing Payroll Process.

		iii)	Permanent Employees

			1)	If all the total Fixed & Regular Income is ≤ Rp10.000.000 in January 2025 or first employment month in 2025, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.

			2)	If eligible, use the existing salary item D12 - Tunjangan Pemerintah to be filled with value, reflecting the PPh 21 DTP amount.

		iv)	Temporary Employees

			1)	If all the total Fixed & Regular Income in one month is ≤ Rp10.000.000, the employee is marked eligible for DTP.
